column2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil dpal be'u dang / bkra shis dang / g-yung drung 'khyil pas brgyan pa ste / rab 'byor /

column1: imAni ucyante SIti anuvyaQjanAni eBiH suBUte SIti anuvyaQjanEH taTAgatasye kAyaH samanvAgataH Bavati evam Kalu suBUte boDisattvasymahAsattvasya Darma dAnam veditavyam
column2: de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la mnga' ba'i dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yin no // rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni / de ltar sbyin pa gnyis po zang zing gi sbyin pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pa dag gis sems can rnams yang dag par sdud par byed de / rab 'byor / de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos yin no // rab 'byor / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos snyan par smra bas sems can rnams yang dag par sdud ce na / rab 'byor / 'di la byang @130a *// chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag gis sems can rnams yang dag par sdud par byed de / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos snyan par smra bas sems can rnams sdud par byed do // de ci'i phyir zhe na; pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad bsdus pa'i phyir ro // rab 'byor / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don spyod pas sems can rnams sdud ce na / pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag nyid kyis / 'di lta ste / sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / don spyod pa dang / don mthun pas sems can rnams yun ring po nas bsdus pa yin no //

column1: punar aparam suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran sattvAn evam avavadati anuSAsti ete yUyam kula putrAH akzarani
column2: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la 'di skad du 'doms shing rjes su ston pa / te / rigs kyi bu dag tshur shog / khyed cag yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas par gyis shig /

column1: eka akzara kuSalAH BavaTa
column2: yi ge gcig la mkhas @130b par gyis shig / yi ge gnyis la mkhas par gyis shig /

column1: dvi akzaram yAvat dvAcatvAriMSat akzarEH kuSalAH Bavata
column2: yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i bar dag la mkhas par gyis shig /

column1: ekena akzareNa sarva vyaya upagatAnupagacCata
column2: yi ge gcig gis thams cad 'grib pa dang ldan par rjes su rtogs par gyis shig /

column1: dvitIyena akzareNa sarva vyaya upagatAnupagacCata
column2: yi ge gnyis kyis thams cad 'grib pa dang ldan par rjes su rtogs par gyis shig /

column1: tRtIyena akzareNa sarva vyaya upagatAnupagacCata
column2: yi ge gsum gyis thams cad 'grib pa dang ldan par rjes su rtogs par gyis shig /

column1: yavat dvAcatvAriMSat akzarEH sarva vyaya upagatAn upagacCate ekasmin akzare dvAcatvAriMSat
column2: yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i bar dag gis thams cad 'grib pa dang ldan par rjes su rtogs par gyis shig / yi ge gcig tu yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa lnga 'dus par sgoms shig /

column1: akzarANi antargatAni BAvayata dvAcatvAriMSat akzarezu eka akzaram antargatam BAvayata
column2: yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa lnga rnams su yi ge gcig 'dus par sgoms shig / ces 'doms par byed de /

column1: sa Kalu punar suBUte boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH dvAcatvAriMSat akzarANi ekasmin akzare kuSalaH BAvayati
column2: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni yi ge gcig la mkhas pa yin no // yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i bar dag la mkhas pa yin no //

column1: eka akzaram dvAcatvAriMSat akzarezu kuSalaH BAvayati
column2: yi ge gcig tu yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa lnga 'dus par bsgom pa la mkhas pa yin no // yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa lnga rnams su yi ge gcig 'dus par bsgom pa la mkhas pa yin te / yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas par byas nas yi ge med pa mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa yin no // rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /

column1: akzara aBinirhAra kOSalam BAvayitvA akzara aBinirhAra kuSalaH Bavati tat yaTA api nAma suBUte taTAgataH rhan samyaksaMbudDaH Darma kuSalaH kzarca sattvAnAm Darmam deSayati
column2: dper na / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni chos la mkhas pa dang / yi ge la mkhas pa yin te / de chos la mkhas pa dang / yi ge @131a *//

column1: sAkzaran Darmam deSayati na anakzaram te ca sattvAH na upalaByante tat kasya hetoH
column2: la mkhas pas chos ston te / yi ge rnams kyis yi ge med pa'i chos ston pa bzhin no //

column1: AkASa nirmitAH hi suBUte sattvAH DarmAH ca veditavyAH
column2: rab 'byor / chos de ni yi ge med pa'i rnam par sprul pa'o //

column1: aTa Kalu AyuzmAn suBUtiH Bagavantam etat avocat
column2: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to // bcom ldan 'das /

column1: yadi Bagavan atyanta tayA sattvAH na upalaByante
column2: gal te mtha' las 'das pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma ma mchis pa stong pa nyid kyi slad du sems can yang gtan dmigs su ma mchis la /

column1: DarmAH na upalaByante
column2: chos kyang dmigs su ma mchis shing /

column1: svaBAvaH ca na upalaByate
column2: chos kyi rang bzhin yang dmigs su ma mchis lags na /

column1: kaTam Bagavan boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran DyAna pAramitAyAm
column2: bcom ldan 'das / 'o na ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /

column1: caran vIrya pAramitAyAm caran kzAnti pAramitAyAm caran SIla pAramitAyAm caran dAna pAramitAyAm caran saptatriMSatsu boDi pakzyezu Darmezu caturzu Arya satyezu sarva SUnyatAsu SUnyatA nimitta apraNihitezu vimokza muKezu azwasu vimokzezu navasu anupUrva vihAra samApattizu daSasu taTAgata balezu caturzu vESAradyezu catasRzu pratisaMvitsu azwAdaSasu AveNikezu budDa Darmezu dvAtriMSat mahApuruza lakzaNezu aSIti anuvyaQjanezu zawsu aBijQAsu vipAkasattvAnAm Darmam deSayati
column2: ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi la spyod pa dang / tshad med pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid bcu bzhi la spyod pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod pa dang / ting nge @131b 'dzin rnams la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par dgu la spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang / rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa drug la spyod pa ji ltar sems can rnams la chos ston pa bgyid lags /

column1: na ca atra sattvaH upalaByate
column2: de la ni sems can dang / sems can du gdags pa'ang dmigs su ma mchis lags te /

column1: na sattva prajQaptiH sattva anupalabDyA rUpa anupalabDiH
column2: sems can dmigs su ma mchis pas /

column1: vedanA saMjQA saMskAra vijQAna anupalabDiH
column2: gzugs kyang dmigs su ma mchis la; rnam par shes pa'i bar du'ang dmigs su ma mchis /

column2: de bzhin du ji ltar nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / 'du shes med / 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar la bslab par bgyi / de bzhin du ji ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la bslab par bgyi /

column2: de bzhin du ji ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi @150a *// rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bslab par bgyi / ji ltar stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi / ji ltar mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la bslab par bgyi / ji ltar rnam par thar pa brgyad la bslab par bgyi / ji ltar snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bslab par bgyi /

column1: Sikzitavyam daSa bala vESAradya pratisaMvid AveNika budDa Darmezu Sikzitavyam mahA karuNAyAm
column2: de bzhin du ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la bslab par bgyi / ji ltar mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bslab par bgyi /

column1: Sikzitavyam zawsu aBijQAsu Sikzitavyam dvAtriMSat mahApuruza lakzaNa parinizpattaye

column1: tat BavantaH nyonyam evam kzubDa cittAH vyApanna cittAH sTAnam etat vidyate yat narakam vA prapataTA tiryagyonim vA yama lokam vA tat BavadBiH ekacittena api na kzobDavyam prAk eva anyezAm cittAnAm avakASaH dAtavyaH ye kuSIdAH sattvAH tAn vIrye niyojayati tezAm evam Darmam deSyati
column2: de'i phyir khyed cag phan tshun 'khrug cing gnod sems su byed na / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du lhung ba'i gnas yin gyi /

column1: yat uta saMskAra nimittam upAdAya tadA kaTam boDisattvena mahAsattvena nAma mAtrakam rUpam iti Sikzitavyam nAma mAtram vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH vijQAnam nAma mAtram yAvat budDa DarmAH iti Sikzitavyam aTa avastukam evam sati tasya nAmnaH tat api nAma mAtram na prayujyate yat idam rUpam iti nAma mAtram na prayujyate yat idam vedanA yAvat budDa DarmA iti nAma mAtram na prayujyate evam ukte BagavAn mEtreyam boDisattvam mahAsattvam etat avocat Agantukam etat nAmaDeyam prakziptam tasmin saMskAra nimitte vastUni yat idam rUpam iti Agantukam etat nAmaDeyam prakziptam yat idam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH vijQAnam Agantukam etat nAmaDeyam prakziptam yat idam yAvat buDa DarmA iti yatas ca mEtreya tena saMskAra nimittena vastUni rUpam iti etasmin nAmni rUpam iti saMpratyayaH Bavati pratyaya AgamaH pratisaMvedanaH tena ca mEtreya paryAyeNa evam veditavyam Agantukam etat nAmaDeyam prakziptam tasmin saMskAra nimitte vastUni yat idam rUpam iti yat idam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH vijQAnam yat idam yAvat budDa DarmAH iti tat kim manyase mEtreya syAt iha ekatyasya tasmin eva saMskAra nimitte vastUni saMjQA vA prajQaptiH vA nAma vA anuvyavahAraH vA aBiniveSaH vA mEtreyaH Aha

column1: aTa Kalu mEtreyaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH Bagavantam etat avocat evam sati Bagavan upalabDaH eva Bavati rUpasya svaBAvaH yat tat saMskAra nimittam vastu yat upAdAya nAma saMjQA prajQaptiH anuvyavahAraH Bavati yat idam rUpam iti yat idam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH vijQAnam yat idam yAvat budDa DarmAH iti evam ukte BagavAn mEtreyam boDisattvam mahAsattvam evam Aha saMskAra nimitte vastUni nAma saMjQA prajQaptiH anuvyavahAraH rUpam iti tat kim manyase mEtreya svaBAvaH vA sa rUpasya prajQapti mAtram vA iti mEtreyaH Aha prajQapti mAtram Bagavan yat idam prajQapti mAtram BagavAn Aha tat kaTam mEtreya tava evam Bavati upalabDaH evam Bavati rUpasya svaBAvaH iti yat tat saMskAra nimitta vastu yat upAdAya nAma saMjQA prajQaptiH anuvyavahAraH Bavati yat idam rUpam iti yat idam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH vijQAnam yat idam yAvat budDa DarmAH iti tat kim manyase mEtreya svaBAvaH vA sa vedanAyAH saMjQAyAH saMskArANAm vijQAnasya yAvat budDa DarmANAm prajQapti mAtram vA iti mEtreyaH Aha prajQapti mAtram Bagavan yat idam prajQapti mAtram BagavAn Aha tat kaTam mEtreya tava evam Bavati upalabDaH evam Bavati vedanAyAH saMjQAyAH saMskArANAm vijQAnasya yAvat budDa DarmANAm svaBAvaH it mEtreyaH Aha saced Bagavat nAma saMjQA saMketa prajQapti vyavahAra mAtra tvam rUpam saced Bagavat nAma saMjQA saMketa prajQapti vyavahAra mAtra tvam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH vijQAnam yAvat budDa DarmAH iti tat evam sati na tu upalabDaH eva svaBAvaH Bavati rUpasya yat idat nAma saMjQA saMketa prajQapti vyavahAra mAtra tvam iti tat evam sati na tu upalabDaH eva svaBAvaH Bavati vedanAyAH saMjQAyAH saMskArANAm vijQAnasya yAvat budDa DarmANAm yat idam nAma saMjQA saMketa prajQapti vyavahAra mAtra tvam iti BagavAn Aha tat kim manyase mEtreya yat rUpam iti nAma saMjQA saMketa prajQapti vyavahAra mAtra tvam yat vedanA iti saMjQA iti saMskArA iti vijQAnam iti yAvat budDa DarmAH iti nAma saMjQA saMketa prajQapti vyavahAra mAtra tvam api nu tasya utpAdaH vA prajQAyate vyayaH vA saMkleSaH vA vyavadAnam vA mEtreyaH Aha no hi idam Bagavan BagavAn Aha tat kutas tava evam Bavati mEtreyaH upalabDaH eva svaBAvaH Bavati rUpasya vedanAyAH saMjQAyAH saMskArANAm vijQAnasya yAvat budDa Darmiti peyAlam mEtreyaH Aha kim punar Bagavan sarvaSas sva lakzaNena na asti eva rUpam kim punar Bagavan sarvaSas sva lakzaNena na asti eva vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH vijQAnam na santi eva yAvat budDa DarmAH BagavAn Aha na aham mEtreya sarvaSas sva lakzaNena rUpan na asti iti vadAmi na aham mEtreya sarvaSas sva lakzaNena vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH vijQAnam yAvat budDa DarmAH na santi iti vadAmi mEtreyaH Aha kaTam Bagavan rUpam asti kaTam vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH vijQAnam yAvat budDa DarmAH santi BagavAn Aha loka saMketa vyavahArataH mEtreya rUpam asti na tu paramArTataH loka saMketa vyavahArataH mEtreya vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH vijQAnam yAvasanti no paramArTataH mEtreyaH Aha yaTA Kalu aham Bagavan BagavataH BAzitasya arTam AjAnAmi niraBilapyaH eva DAtuH paramArTataH saced Bagavat niraBilapyaH DAtuH paramArTataH tat kaTam yat tat saMskAra nimittam vastu yatra rUpam iti Agantukam nAmaDeyam prakzipyate tat kaTam yat tat saMskAra nimittam vastu yatra vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH vijQAnam yAvat budDa DarmA iti Agantukam nAmaDeyam prakzipna Bavati saced tat na parama arTaH tat kaTam niraBilapyaH DAtuH Bavati saMskAra nimittam vastu niraBilapyaH DAtuH iti na yujyate BagavAn Aha tena hi mEtreya tvAm eva atra pratipakzAmi yaTA te kzamate taTA aivam vyAkuru tat kim manyase mEtreya yaTA te niraBilapya DAtO prajQA pracAraH Bavati upalaBase tvam tasmin samaye saMskAra nimittam vastu yatra idam Agantuka nAmaDeyam prakziptam yat idam rUpam iti vedanA iti saMjQA iti saMskarAH iti vijQAnam iti yAvat budDa DarmAH iti

column1: mEtryaH Aha no hi idam Bagavan BagavAn Aha tat anena api te mEtreya paryAyeNa evam veditavyam yat tat saMskAra nimittam vastuH tat niraBilapyAt DAtoH na anyat na api ananyan sa ca tasmAt saMskAra nimittAt vastunaH na anyaH niraBilapyaH DAtuH na api ananyaH yatra idam Agantukam nAmaDeyam prakzipatam yat idam rUp vedanA iti saMjQA iti saMskArAH iti vijQAnam iti yAvat budDa DarmAH iti saMskAra nimittAt ced vastunaH mEtreya niraBilapyaH DAtuH anyaH syAt api idAnIm sarvakAlam pRTagjanAH parinirvAyuH anuttarAm samyak s ananyaH ced mEtreya saMskAra nimittAt vastunaH niraBilapyaH DAtuH syAt api idAnIm tat api nimittam na upalaByet yatas tasya niraBilapyasya DAtoH prativeDaH Bavet tat anena api te mEtreya paryAyeNa evam veditavyam na tasmAt saMskAra nimittAt vastunaH nyaH niraBilapyaH DAtuH na api tasmAt ananyaH niraBilapyaH DAtuH yatra idam Agantukam nAmaDeyam prakzipatam yat idam rUpam iti vedanA iti saMjQA iti saMskArAH itiiti yAvat budDa DarmAH iti mEtreyaH Aha saced Bagavan boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH niraBilapya DAtu upanibadDe prajQA pracAre vartamAnaH tat saMskAra nimittam vastu na upalaBate yatra idam Agantukam nAmaDeyam prakziptam yat idam rUpam iti vedanA iti saMjQA iti saMskArAH iti vijQAnam iti yAvat budDa DarmAH iti tat kaTam Bagavan vidyamAnam na upalaBate evam ukte BagavAn mEtreyam boDisattvam mahAsattvam evam Aha na hi mEtreya tasya saMskAra nimittasya vastunaH kAcid vidyamAna tA vA avidyamAna tA vA tat kasya hetoH yasmin hi vA mEtreya samaye tat saMskAra nimittam vastu vikalpayasi tasmin samaye tat saMskAra nimittam vastu vikalpataH grahaNam tasmin vA punar samaye niraBilapya DAtu upanibadDe prajQA pracAre vartamAnaH na vikalpayasi tasmin samaye nirvikalpataH grahaNam eti mEtreyaH Aha evam Bagavan BagavAn Aha na tu evam sati mEtreya vikalpa mAtram etat yat uta saMskAra nimittam vastu yatra idam Agantukam nAmaDeyam prakziptam yat idam rUpam iti vedanA iti saMjQA iti saMskarAH iti vijQAnam iti yAvat budDa DarmAH iti vikalpa mAtre vA punar tasya nirvikalpe vA DAtO vartamAnasya vikalpezu apagatezu katamA tasya vidyamAna tA vA avidyamAna tA vA upalaBy yatra idam Agantukam nAmaDeyam prakziptam yat idam rUpam iti vedanA iti saMjQA iti saMskArAH iti vijQAnam iti yAvat budDa DarmAH iti mEtreyaH Aha prajQApAramitAyAm caratA Bagavan boDisattvena mahAsattvena Darma praBeda kOSalye vartamAnena katiBiH AkArEH rUpa praBeda prajQaptiH katiBiH AkArEH vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH vijQAnam yAvat budDa Darma praBeda prajQaptiH anugantavyA BagavAn Aha triBiH mEtreya AkArEH boDisattvena mahAsattvena prajQApAramitAyAm caratA Darma praBeda kOSalye vartamAnena rUpa praBeda prajQaptiH an vedanA saMjQA saMskArA vijQAnam yAvat buDDa Darma praBeda prajQaptiH anugantavyA yat uta idam parikalpitam rUpam idam vikalpitam rUpam idam DarmatA rUpam iti yat uta iyam parikalpitAH vedanA iyam vikalpitAH vedanA iyam DarmatA vedanA yat uta iyam parikalpitA saMjQA iyam vikalpitA saMjQA iyam DarmatA saMjQA yat uta ime parikalpitAH saMskArAH ime vikalpitAH saMskArAH ime DarmatA saMskArAH idam parikalpitam vijQAnam idam vikalpitam vijQAnam idam DarmatA vijQAnam ime yAvat parikalpitAH budDa DarmAH ime vikalpitAH budDa DarmAH ime DarmatA budDa DarmAH mEtreyaH Aha katamat Bagavan parikalpitam rUpam katamat vikalpitam rUpam katamat DarmatA rUpam katamA Bagavan parikalpitA vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH vijQAnam katamA vikalpA etA vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH vijQAnam katamA DarmatA vedanA saMjjQA saMskArAH vijQAnam yAvat katame Bagavan parikalpitAH buDa DarmAH katame vikalpitAH budDa DarmAH katame DarmatA budDa DarmAH BagavAn Aha column1: yat mEtreya tasmin saMskAra nimitte vastUni vedanA iti saMjQA iti saMskAraH iti vijQAnam iti yAvat budDa DarmAH iti nAma saMjQA saMketa prajQapti vyavahAran niSritya vedanA svaBAva tayA saMjQA svaBAva tayA saMskAra svaBAvatayA vijQAna svaBAvatayA yAvat budDa Darma svaBAvatayA parikalpanA iyam parikalpitA vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH vijQAnam yAvat ime parikalpitAH budDa DarmAH yA punar budDa DarmAH iti idam vikalpitam rUpam iyam vikalpitAH vedanAH iyam vikalpitA saMjQAH ime vikalpitAH saMskArAH idam vikalpitam vijQAnam ime vikalpitAH budDa DarmAH yA utpAdAt vA taTAgatAnAm anutpAdAt vA sTitA eva iyam DarmANAm DarmatA Darma sTiti tA DarmaDAtuH yat tena parikalpita rUpeNa tasya vikalpita rUpasya nityam nityakAlam Druvam Druva kAlam niHsvaBAva tA Darma nErAtmyam taTatA BUtakowiH idam DarmatA rUpam iyam DarmatA vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH vijQAnam ime yAvat budDa DarmAH mEtreyaH Aha ezAm Bagavan trayANAm rUpANAm katamat rUpam adravyam drazwavyam katamat sa dravyam drazwavyam katamat na eva adravyam na sa dravyam drazwavyam parama arTa praBAvitam AsAm Bagavan tizRNAm vedanAnAm tizRNAm saMjQAnAm trayANAm saMskArANAm trayANAm vijQAnAnAm trayANAm yAvat budDa DarmANAm katame katame sa dravyA drazwavyA katame na eva adravyAH drazwavyAH na sa dravyAn parama arTa praBAvitAH BagavAn Aha yat mEtreya parikalpitam rUpam idam adravyam drazwavyam yat vikalpitam rUpam idam vikalpitam rUpam sa dravya tAm upAdAya sa dravyam drazwavyam no tu svatantra vRttitaH yat DarmatA rUpam tat na eva adravyam sa dravyam parama arTa praBAvitam drazwavyam yA mEtreya parikalpitA vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH vijQAnam yAvat ye parikalpitAH budDa DarmAH ime dravyAH drazwavyAH yA vikalpitA vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH vijQAnam yAvat ye vikalpitAH budDa DarmAH ime vikalpita sadravya tAm upAdAya sa dravyAH drazwavyA yA mEtreya DarmatA vedanA saMjQA saMskArAH vijQAnam yAvat ye mEtreya DarmatA budDa DarmAH te na eva adravyAH na sa dravyAH parama arTena mEtreyaH Aha yat uktam Bagavan BagavatA dvayasya ezA gaNanA kRtA yat uta rUpam iti advayasya ezA gaNanA kRtA yat uta vedanA iti saMjQA iti saMskArAH iti vijQAnam iti yAvat budDa DarmAH iti tat evam rUpa praBeda prajQaptO evam vedanA saMjQA BagavAn Aha yA punar tatra nAma saMjQA prajQapti vyavahAra mAtra tA rUpam iti api nu tat rUpam mEtreyaH Aha no hi idam Bagavan BagavAn Aha tat anena mEtreya paryAyeNa evam veditavyam yat parikalpitam column1: yat rUpasya na prahANam na aprahANam idam eva asya prahANam yat vedanAyAH saMjQAyAH saMskArANAm vijQAnasya yAvat budDa DarmANAm na prahANam na aprahANam idam eva asya prahANam yA rUpasya na sAkzAtkriyA nAsAkzAt kriyA iyam eva asya sAkzAtkriyA yAH vedanAyAH saMjQAyAH saMskArANAm vijQAnasya yAvat budDa DarmANAm na sAkzAtkriyA nAsAkzAt kriyA iyam eva asya sAkzAtkriyA rUpa prahANAya na mArgasya BAvanA na aBAvanA iyam eva asya BAvanAyAH evam vedanAyAH saMjQAyAH saMskArANAm vijQAnasya yAvat budDa DarmANAm prahANAya na mArgasya BAvanA nABAvanAH iyam eva asya BAvanA mEtreyaH Aha prajQApAramitAyAm Bagavan carataH boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya evam parijQA prahANa sAkzAtkriyA BAvanA samanvAgatasya katamam nirvANam BagavAn Aha gamBIram mEtreya parama gamBIram boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm nirvANam mEtreyaH Aha kena kAraNena boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm evam gamBIram parama gamBIram nirvANam BagavAn Aha boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm mEtreya nirvANam yat nirvANam na anirvANam tena gamBIram parama gamBIram iti ucyate mEtreyaH Aha kaTam Bagavan boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm na nirvANam Bavati BagavAn Aha para arTam mEtreya AraBya saMsAra aparityAgaH na nirvANam Atma arTam AraBya nirvANa aparityAgaH na anirvANam mEtreyaH Aha saced Bagavan boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH para arTam AraBya saMsAram na parityajati saMsArAt parityAgAt kaTam anena nirvANam na parity saced Bagavan boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH Atma arTam AraBya nirvANam na parityajati nirvANa aparityAgAt kaTam anena saMsAraH na parityaktaH BagavAn Aha iha mEtreya boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran saMsAram api saMsArataH na vikalpayati nirvANam api nirvANataH na vikalpayati tasya evam avikalpayataH samam etat Bavati yat uta saMsAraH ca nirvANaH ca tat kasya hetoH taTA hi sa yaTA saMsAram saMsArataH vikalpayan saMsArAt na udvijati taTA aiva nirvANam nirvANataH vikalpayan nirvANataH na udvijati evam avikalpa DAtu pratizWitasya anayA yuktyA na saMsAra parityAgaH na nirv mEtreyaH Aha na nu Bagavan prajQApAramitAyAm caratA boDisattvena mahAsattvena avikalpa DAtu pratizWitena saMsAraH yaTA eva na tyaktaH taTA na adattaHatyaktaH Bavati nirvANam yaTA na tyaktam taTA na adattam kaTam atyaktam Bavati BagavAn Aha na aham mEtreya saMsArasya evam AdAnam vAnAdAnam vA vadAmi nirvANasya evam AdAnam vAnAdAnam vA vadAmi api tu mEtreya prajQApAramitAyAm carataH boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya avikalpa DAtu Alambanena jQAnena citta vaSitAm anuprAptasya daSa diSi loke gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtu sUpAya kOSalyena saMsAra sAMdarSana tAm upAdAya aham parinirvRtANAm boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm saMsArasya aparityAgam vadAmi SUnyatAm upalaMBa DAtu pratizWAna tAm upAdAya nirvANasya aparityAgam vadAmi mEtreyaH Aha avikalpanAyAH Bagavan kaTam samasta lakzaNam drazwavyam BagavAn Aha yat ca mEtreya rUpam yA ca vedanA yA ca saMjQA ye ca saMskArAH yat ca vijQAnam yAvat ye ca budDa DarmA yA ca rUpasya SUnyatA yA ca vedanAyAH yA ca saMjQAyAH yA ca saMskArANAm yA ca vijQAnasya yA ca yAvat budDa DarmANAm SUnyatA tezAm ca DarmANAm tasyAH ca SUnyatAyAH yA BAva aBAva advayatA yA ca aprapaQcanAH idam mEtreya avikalpanAyAH samasta lakzaNam drazwavyam mEtreyaH Aha kim nu Bagavan sarvezAm SrAvakANAm eka aMSena ekAMSikI nirvANa pratizWA Bavati BagavAn Aha no hi idam mEtreya tat kasya hetoH hi nAnA DAtukaH yam mEtreya lokaH nekaDAtukaH tasmin ca nAnA DAtukezu BUtAH sattva gotra column1: yezAm DarmANAm saMskRta AsaMskRtAnAm sama tA sa parama arTaH tat boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran paramArTataH ca na c sattvAnAm ca kRtyam karoti suBUtiH Aha
column2: 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos de dag mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni don dam pa yin no // de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa don dam pa las kyang mi g-yo la // / byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba dag kyang byed do // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las / don dam pa'i rnal 'byor gyi le'u zhes bya ba ste brgyad cu rtsa gcig pa'o //// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to // bcom ldan 'das /

column1: yadi Bagavan sarva DarmAH SUnyAH tat na kasyacid Darmasya kaScid DarmaH kiMcid karoti akiMcitkarezu akiMcanezu nizkiMcanezu ca aDarmezu kaTam boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm

column1: Atma saMjQAyAH vivecya SUnyatayA mocayati saMsArAt evam sattva saMjQAyAH vivecayati jIva saMjQAyAH jantu saMjQAyAH poza saMjQAyAH puruza saMjQAyAH pudgala saMjQAyAH manuja saMjQAyAH mAnava saMjQAyAH kAraka saMjQAyAH vedaka saMjQAyAH jAnaka saMjQAyAH
column2: sems can rnams kyang bdag tu 'du shes pa dang bral bar mdzad cing phral nas kyang stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las thar bar mdzad pa dang / de bzhin du sems can du 'du shes pa dang / byed pa por 'du shes pa'i bar dang / gzugs su 'du shes pa dang / rnam par shes par 'du shes pa'i bar dang / mig tu 'du shes pa dang / yid du 'du shes pa'i bar dang / sa'i khams su 'du shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams su 'du shes pa'i bar dang / 'dus @235b byas kyi khams su 'du shes pa dang bral bar mdzad cing phral nas kyang 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings stong pa de la 'god par mdzad pa 'di / de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog tu gyur par mi 'gyur ro // gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /

column1: paSyaka saMjQAyAH ca vivecayati
column2: ci zhig gis stong pa lags / bka' stsal pa / rab 'byor /

column1: rUpa saMjQAyAH vivecayati
column2: de la 'du shes pa gang yin pa des stong ngo // rab 'byor / sprul pa zhig gis sprul pa gzhan sprul na / ci de la gang stong pa nyid ma yin pa'i dngos po 'ga' zhig yod snyam mam / gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das / de ni ma lags te / sprul pa la ni / gang stong pa nyid ma lags pa'i dngos po 'ga' yang ma mchis te / stong pa nyid gang lags pa dang / sprul pa gang lags pa'i chos de gnyis ni ldan pa'ang ma lags / mi ldan pa'ang ma lags te / chos de gnyis ni / stong pa nyid kyis stong pa lags so // bka' stsal pa / rab 'byor / 'di ji snyam du sems / 'di ni sprul pa'o // 'di ni stong pa nyid do // zhes rnam par sprul pa zhig yod snyam mam / gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das / de ni ma lags so // de ci'i slad du zhe na / 'di ltar stong pa nyid la ni 'di ni sprul pa'o // 'di ni stong pa nyid do zhes bgyi ba'i chos de gnyis su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o // bka' stsal pa / rab 'byor / gang sprul pa ma yin pa'i gzugs sam /

column1: vedanA saMjQAyAH vivecayati
column2: tshor ba'am /

column1: saMjQA saMjQAyAH vivecayati
column2: 'du shes sam /

column1: saMskAra saMjQAyAH vivecayati
column2: 'du byed rnams sam /

column1: vijQAna saMjQAyAH vivecayati
column2: rnam par @236a *// shes pa ni gang yang med de / sprul pa gang yin pa de'ang stong pa nyid yin no // de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to // bcom ldan 'das / gal te 'jig rten pa'i chos de dag sprul pa lags na / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos /

column1: cakzuH saMjQAyAH vivecayati
column2: 'di lta ste / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po de dag kyang sprul pa lags sam / de dag gi 'bras bu gang lags pa dang / gang gis de dag gi gang zag tu mngon pa rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang lags pa'i chos de dag kyang sprul pa lags sam / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to // rab 'byor / 'di ltar chos thams cad ni sprul pa ste / @236b de la la la ni /

column1: Srotra saMjQAyAH vivecayati
column2: nyan thos kyi sprul pa'o // la la ni / rang sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'o // la la ni / byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa'o // la la ni / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'o // la la ni / nyon mongs pa'i sprul pa'o // la la ni / chos kyi sprul pa ste / rab 'byor / rnam grangs des na chos thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu yin no // gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das / gang 'di spong ba zhes bgyi ba rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi chos de dag kyang sprul pa lags sam / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spangs pa'i chos de dag kyang sprul pa lags sam / bka' stsal pa / rab 'byor / bskyed pa'am / bkag pa'i chos gang ci'ang rung ste / de dag thams cad ni sprul pa'o // gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das / gang ma sprul pa'i chos de gang lags / bka' stsal pa / rab 'byor / gang la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa de ni /

column1: GrANa saMjQAyAH vivecayati jihvA saMjQAyAH vivecayati
column2: ma sprul pa'o // gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das / de gang lags / bka' stsal pa / rab 'byor / de ni mi slu ba'i chos can mya ngan las 'das pa ste / chos de ni ma sprul pa'o // gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das / gang yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du stong pa nyid las kyang mi g-yo la / gnyis kyis kyang mi gos te / gang stong pa nyid ma @237a *// yin pa'i chos gang yang med do //

column1: kAya saMjQAyAH vivecayati
column2: zhes bka' stsal pa ltar na / bcom ldan 'das mi slu ba'i chos can mya ngan las 'das pa'ang sprul pa lags par 'gyur ro // bka' stsal pa / rab 'byor / de de bzhin no // de de bzhin te / rab 'byor / chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ste / de dag ni / nyan thos rnams kyis ma byas / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma byas / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ma byas / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang ma mdzad de / ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa gang yin pa de ni /

column1: manaH saMjQAyAH vivecayati
column2: mya ngan las 'das pa yin no // de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to // bcom ldan 'das / las dang po pa'i gang zag gis ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid yongs su 'tshal bar bgyid na / ji ltar gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi lags / bka' stsal pa / rab 'byor / ci sngon dngos po yod par gyur la / phyis dngos po med par 'gyur ba yod dam / rab 'byor / 'di la dngos po'ang med / dngos po med pa'ang med / rang gi dngos po'ang med / gzhan gyi dngos po'ang med na / de la gang yang yongs su shes par bya ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba lta yod par ga la 'gyur / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las / chos nyid 'gyur ba med pa bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste brgyad cu @237b rtsa gnyis pa'o //// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa / bam po lnga bcu rtsa bdun pa / de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas zhus pa / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa / byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la slob par 'tshal bas / gzugs la ji ltar bslab par bgyi /

column1: cakzuH vijQAna saMjQAyAH vivecayati cakzuH saMsparSa saMjQAyAH vivecayati
column2: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la ji ltar bslab par bgyi /

column1: cakzuH saMsparSa pratyaya vedanA saMjQAyAH vivecayati
column2: mig gi skye mched dang / rna ba'i skye mched dang / sna'i skye mched dang / lce'i skye mched dang / lus kyi skye mched dang / yid kyi skye mched la ji ltar bslab par bgyi /

column1: evam Srotra GrANa jihvA kAya manaH vijQAna saMjQAyAH vivecayati
column2: gzugs kyi skye mched dang / sgra'i skye mched dang / dri'i skye mched dang / ro'i skye mched dang / reg bya'i skye mched dang / chos kyi skye mched la ji ltar bslab par bgyi / mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi khams dang / rag bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la ji ltar bslab par bgyi / mig gi reg pa'i skye mched dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / @238a *// lus dang / yid kyi reg pa'i skye mched la ji ltar bslab par bgyi / ma rig pa la ji ltar bslab par bgyi / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi la ji ltar bslab par bgyi / sdug bsngal gyi bden pa la ji ltar bslab par bgyi / kun 'byung ba'i bden pa dang / 'gog pa'i bden pa dang / lam gyi bden pa la ji ltar bslab par bgyi / gzugs can gyi chos rnams la ji ltar bslab par bgyi / gzugs can ma lags pa dang / bstan du mchis pa dang / bstan du ma mchis pa dang / thogs pa dang bcas pa dang / thogs pa ma mchis pa dang / 'dus bgyis dang / 'dus ma bgyis dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa ma mchis pa dang / kha na ma thob dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa dang / bsten par bgyi ba dang bsten par bgyi ba ma lags pa dang / dam pa dang / gya nom pa dang / nang dang / phyi dang / mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / bye brag phyed pa dang / rnam par shes pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa dang / 'dod pa dang rab tu ldan pa dang / gzugs dang rab tu ldan pa dang / gzugs @238b med ba dang rab tu ldan pa dang / ldan pa ma lags pa dang / slob pa dang / mi slob pa dang / 'dod chags pa / khong khro ba dang / nga rgyal dang / ma rig pa dang / lta ba dang / the tshom la ji ltar bslab par bgyi / ser sna dang / sbyin pa dang / 'chal ba'i tshul khrims dang / tshul khrims bzang po dang / gnod sems dang / bzod pa dang / le lo dang / brtson 'grus dang / rnam par g-yeng ba dang / bsam gtan dang / 'chal ba'i shes rab dang / shes rab la ji ltar bslab par bgyi / rnam par rtog pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / log pa'i smon lam dang / smon pa ma mchis pa dang / mi sdug pa'i chos rnams dang / mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa rnams la ji ltar bslab par bgyi / nyon mongs pa rnams dang / nyon mongs pa spangs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa dang / byang chub dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la ji ltar bslab par bgyi / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa / byams pa / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa / byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la slob par 'dod pas gzugs ming tsam mo zhes bya bar bslab par bya'o //

column1: manaH saMsparSa saMjQAyAH vivecayati
column2: tshor ba @239a *// dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ming tsam mo zhes bya ba nas / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du ming tsam mo zhes bya bar bslab par bya'o // de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to // bcom ldan 'das / gang gi tshe 'di lta ste / gzugs zhes bgyi ba'i ming 'di dngos po dang bcas par dmigs pa nas / 'di lta ste / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming 'di dngos po dang bcas par dmigs pa nas / 'di lta ste / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bgyi ba'i bar gyi ming 'di ni 'du byed kyi mtshan ma nye bar bzung ste / dngos po dang bcas par dmigs pa lags na / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas gzugs ming tsam zhes bgyi bar bslab par bgyi /

column1: manaH saMsparSa pratyaya vedanA saMjQAyAH vivecayati
column2: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ming tsam zhes bgyi ba nas / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du ming tsam zhes bgyi bar ji ltar bslab par bgyi / dngos po ma mchis su lags na / de'i ming de'ang ming tsam kho na zhes bgyir mi rung lags te / 'di lta ste / gzugs zhes bgyi ba ni ming tsam kho na zhes bgyir mi rung lags so // 'di lta ste / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes @239b pa zhes bgyi ba ni ming tsam kho na zhes bgyir mi rung lags so // sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bgyi ba'i bar du'ang ming tsam kho na zhes bgyir mi rung lags so // de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa / byams pa / 'di lta ste / gzugs zhes bya ba 'di ni 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de la glo bur du ming btags pa'o // 'di lta ste / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du ming btags pa'o // 'di lta ste; sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bya ba'i bar 'di'ang glo bur du ming btags pa'o // de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to // bcom ldan 'das / 'di ltar gzugs zhes bgyi ba'i ming ma mchis par ni 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po des ming de rig pa dang / rtogs pa dang / 'tshal bar yang mi 'gyur la / gzugs zhes bgyi ba'i ming des ni 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de rtogs pa dang / 'tshal bar yang 'gyur na / 'di lta ste / gzugs zhes bya ba 'di ni 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de la glo bur du ming btags so zhes bgyi bar ji ltar 'gyur / bcom ldan 'das / 'di ltar 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po des tshor ba zhes bgyi ba dang / 'du shes zhes bgyi ba dang / 'du byed rnams zhes bgyi ba dang / rnam par shes pa @240a *// zhes bgyi ba dang / bcom ldan 'das / 'di ltar 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po des sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bgyi ba'i bar gyi ming rig pa dang / rtogs pa dang / 'tshal bar yang mi 'gyur la / tshor ba zhes bgyi ba dang / 'du shes zhes bgyi ba dang / 'du byed rnams zhes bgyi ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba de dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bgyi ba'i bar des ni 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de nyid rig pa dang / rtogs pa dang / 'tshal bar yang 'gyur na / 'di lta ste /

column1: rUpa saMjQAyAH vivecayati
column2: gzugs zhes bya ba dang / 'di lta ste /

column1: saMskRta DAtu saMjQAyAH vivecayati
column2: 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po la gzugs zhes bya bar ming dang / 'du shes dang / 'dogs pa dang / rjes su tha snyad 'dogs pa byed pa la / byams pa / 'di ji snyam du sems / de gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid yin nam / btags pa tsam du zad; gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das / btags pa tsam du bas lags so // byams pa / 'o na 'di lta ste / 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar ni gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid du dmigs pa kho na'o zhes bya bar byams pa khyod ji ltar de snyam du sems / byams pa / 'di ji snyam du sems / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid de btags @242a *// pa tsam du zad dam / bcom ldan 'das / btags pa tsam du bas lags so // byams pa / 'o na / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid dmigs pa kho na'o zhes bya bar khyod ji ltar de snyam du sems sam / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to // bcom ldan 'das / gal te gzugs ming dang / 'du shes dang / brda dang / btags pa dang / tha snyad tsam kho na lags shing / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du ming dang / 'du shes dang / brda dang / btags pa dang / tha snyad tsam kho na lags na / de lta na 'di lta ste / ming dang / 'du shes dang / brda dang / btags pa dang / tha snyad tsam zhes bgyi bas gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dmigs pa kho nar mi 'gyur lags sam / de lta na tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid dmigs pa kho nar mi 'gyur lags sam / de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to // byams pa / 'di ji snyam du sems / gzugs @242b zhes bya ba'i ming dang / 'du shes dang / brda dang / btags pa dang / tha snyad tsam kho na gang yin pa de la ci ga skye ba'am / 'jig pa'am / kun nas nyon mongs pa'am / rnam par byang ba yod dam; bcom ldan 'das / de ni ma mchis lags so // bka' stsal pa / byams pa / 'o na khyod 'di ji snyam du gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dmigs pa kho na'o snyam du sems pa de ci las gyur / byams pa / de ji snyam du sems / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bya ba'i bar gyi ming dang / 'du shes dang / brda dang / btags pa dang / tha snyad tsam kho na gang yin pa de la ci ga skye ba'am / 'jig pa'am / kun nas nyon mongs pa'am / rnam par byang ba yod dam / gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das / de ni ma mchis lags so // bka' stsal pa / byams pa / 'o na khyod 'di ji snyam du / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te sangs rgyas kyi ches rnams kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid dmigs pa kho na'o snyam du sems pa de ci las gyur / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to // bcom ldan 'das / ci rnam pa thams cad du mtshan nyid thams cad kyis / gzugs ma mchis pa kho na lags sam / bcom ldan 'das / ci rnam pa thams cad du mtshan nyid @243a *// thams cad kyis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du ma mchis pa kho na lags sam / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa / byams pa / rnam pa thams cad du mtshan nyid thams cad kyis gzugs med do zhes nga mi smra'o // byams pa / rnam pa thams cad du mtshan nyid thams cad kyis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du med do zhes nga mi smra'o // de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to // bcom ldan 'das / ji ltar na gzugs mchis pa lags / bcom ldan 'das / ji ltar na tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du mchis pa lags / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa / byams pa / 'jig rten gyi brda dang / tha snyad kyis gzugs yod kyi / don dam par ni ma yin no // byams pa / 'jig rten gyi brda dang / tha snyad kyis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du @243b yod kyi / don dam par ni ma yin no // de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to // bcom ldan 'das / bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na / dbyings 'di ni don dam par na brjod du ma mchis pa'o // bcom ldan 'das / gal te brjod du ma mchis pa'i dbyings don dam par mchis su lags na / 'o na 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang la gzugs zhes bgyi bar glo bur du ming du 'dogs par ji ltar 'gyur / don dam par mchis na / 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bgyi ba'i bar du glo bur du ming du 'dogs par ji ltar 'gyur / gal te don dam par ma mchis na ni / 'o na brjod du ma mchis pa'i dbyings su'ang ji ltar 'gyur te / 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po ni brjod du ma mchis pa'i dbyings zhes bgyir mi rung lags so // de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa / byams pa / de'i phyir khyod nyid la dri'i / ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob cig / byams pa / 'di ji snyam du sems / gang gi tshe brjod du med pa'i dbyings dang 'brel pa'i shes rab kyi spyod pa la gnas pa de'i tshe /

column2: @246b bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / byams pa / gang 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de la gzugs zhes bya ba'i ming dang / 'du shes dang / btags pa dang / tha snyad la brten nas gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid du yongs su rtog pa 'di ni kun btags pa'i gzugs so // byams pa / gang 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de la tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar gyi ming dang / 'du shes dang / btags pa dang / tha snyad la brten nas tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid du yongs su rtog pa 'di ni kun btags pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'o // 'di dag ni kun btags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag go / 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de rnam par rtog pa tsam gyi chos nyid la gnas pa'i rnam par rtog pa la brten nas / mngon par brjod de /

column2: gang la 'di ni gzugs so zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba'o zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes so zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams so zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa'o zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so zhes bya ba'i bar gyi ming dang / 'du shes dang / btags pa dang / tha snyad gang yin @247a *// pa 'di ni rnam par btags pa'i gzugs so // 'di ni rnam par btags pa'i tshor ba'o // 'di ni rnam par btags pa'i 'du shes so // 'di ni rnam par btags pa'i 'du byed rnams so // 'di ni rnam par btags pa'i rnam par shes pa'o // 'di dag ni rnam par btags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag go / gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /

column1: yadi Bagavan ime lOkikAH DarmAH nirmitAH api nu ime loka uttarAH DarmAH nirmitAH yat uta catvAri smRti upasTAnAni catvAri samyak prahANAni catvAraH RdDi pAdAH paQca indriyANi paQca balAni sapta boDi aFgAni Arya azwa aFgaH mArgaH catvAri Arya satyAni SUnyatA nimitta apraNihitAni

column2: chos nyid 'di ni gnas pa nyid dang / chos gnas pa'i dbyings dang / gang kun btags pa'i gzugs des rnam par btags pa'i gzugs rtag pa rtag pa'i dus dang / ther zug ther zug gi dus su ngo bo nyid med pa kho na dang / chos la bdag med pa dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' 'di ni chos nyid kyi gzugs so // 'di ni chos nyid kyi tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'o //

column1: sarva samADayaH sarva DAraNI muKAni daSa pAramitA daSa boDisattva BUmayaH daSa taTAgata balAni
column2: 'di dag ni chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag go / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to // bcom ldan 'das / gzugs gsum po 'di dag las rdzas su ma mchis par blta ba'i gzugs ni gang lags / rjes su mchis pa ni gang lags / rdzas su ma mchis pa'ang ma lags la / rdzas su mchis pa'ang ma lags shing / @247b don dam pas rab tu phye ba ni gang lags /

column1: catvAri vESAradyAni catasraH pratisaMvidaH zwAdaSa AveNikA budDa DarmA mahA karuNA yat ca tezAm Palam yena te pudgalAH prajQA apyante
column2: tshor ba gsum po 'di dag dang / 'du shes gsum po 'di dag dang / 'du byed gsum po 'di dag dang / rnam par shes pa gsum po 'di dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du gsum po 'di dag las rdzas su ma mchis pa dag ni gang lags / rdzas su mchis pa dag ni gang lags / rdzas su ma mchis pa'ang ma lags la / rdzas su mchis ba'ang ma lags shing / don dam pas rab tu phye ba dag ni gang lags / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa / byams pa / gang kun btags pa'i gzugs de ni rdzas su med par blta bar bya'o // rnam par btags pa'i gzugs gang yin pa de ni rnam par rtog pa rdzas su yod pa'i phyir / rdzas su yod par blta bar bya ste / rang dbang du 'byung ba'i phyir ni ma yin no // gang chos nyid kyi gzugs de ni rdzas su med pa'ang ma yin / rdzas su yod pa'ang ma yin zhing / don dam pas rab tu phye bar blta bar bya'o // kun btags pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / gang dag kun btags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar de dag ni rdzas su med par blta bar bya'o // gang rnam par btags pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / gang dag rnam par btags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar de dag ni rnam par rtog pa rdzas su yod @248a *// pa'i phyir rdzas su yod par blta bar bya ste / rang dbang du 'byung ba'i phyir ni ma yin no // byams pa / gang chos nyid kyi tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / byams pa / gang dag chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar de dag ni rdzas su med pa'ang ma yin la / rdzas su yod pa'ang ma yin zhing / don dam pas rab tu phye bar blta bar bya'o // de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to // bcom ldan 'das / de ltar gzugs rab tu dbye ba'i btags pa'ang ma mchis la / de ltar tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du rab tu dbye ba'i btags pa'ang ma mchis na / 'di lta ste / gzugs zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o // 'di lta ste / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar 'di ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o // zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gang bka' stsal pa de / bcom ldan 'das kyis ci la dgongs nas / 'di lta ste / gzugs zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o // 'di lta ste / tshor @248b ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med ba'i grangs su byas pa'o zhes bka' stsal / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa / byams pa / 'di ji snyam du sems / kun btags ba'i gzugs la rdzas su med pa nyid gang yin pa de gzugs yin nam / 'on te ma yin / gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das / de ni ma lags so // de la gzugs zhes bya ba ming dang / 'du shes dang / btags pa dang / tha snyad tsam nyid gang yin pa de cig gzugs yin nam / gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das / de ni ma lags so // byams pa / rnam grangs 'dis gang kun btags pa'i gzugs de gzugs kyang ma yin la / gzugs ma yin pa'ang ma yin te / gang gzugs kyang ma yin la / gzugs ma yin pa'ang ma yin pa de ni gnyis su med pa ste / ngas 'di la dgongs nas / 'di lta ste / gzugs zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o zhes bka' stsal par rig par bya'o // byams pa / 'di ji snyam du sems gang la brten nas gzugs zhes pa'i mi dang / btags pa dang / tha snyad du 'gyur pa rnam par btags pa'i gzugs rdzas su yod pa nyid gang yin pa de cig gzugs ma yin pa yin @249a *// nam / gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das / de ni ma lags so // byams pa / 'di ji snyam du sems / rnam par btags pa'i gzugs de nyid la kun btags pa'i gzugs des / de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin zhing / de'i mtshan nyid ma yin pa gang yin pa de gzugs yin nam / gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das / de ni ma lags so // byams pa / rnam grangs 'dis kyang / 'di ltar gang rnam par btags pa'i gzugs de'ang gzugs kyang ma yin la / gzugs ma yin pa'ang ma yin te / gang gzugs kyang ma yin la / gzugs ma yin pa'ang ma yin pa de gnyis su med pa ste / ngas de la dgongs nas / 'di lta ste / gzugs zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o // zhes bka' stsal par rig par bya'o // byams pa / 'di ji snyam du sems / gang chos nyid kyi gzugs bdag med pas / rab tu phye ba'i gzugs de cig gzugs yin nam / gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das / de ni ma lags so // chos nyid kyi gzugs de nyid gzugs kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin nam / gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das / de ni ma lags so // byams pa / rnam grangs 'dis kyang / 'di ltar chos nyid kyi gzugs gang yin pa de'ang gzugs kyang ma yin la / gzugs ma yin pa'ang ma yin te / gang gzugs kyang ma yin la / gzugs ma yin pa'ang ma yin pa @249b de ni gnyis su med pa ste / ngas de la dgongs nas 'di lta ste / gzugs zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o zhes bka' stsal par rig par bya ste / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar la'ang sbyar bar bya'o // de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to // bcom ldan 'das / byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa / de ltar gzugs la gnyis su ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid la mkhas shing / de ltar tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag la mtshan nyid ma mchis pa la mkhas pa mtha' gnyis spangs nas /

column1: SradDA anusArI Darma anusArI azwamakaH srotaApannaH sakRdAgAmi anAgAmi arhan pratyekabudDaH
column2: dbu ma'i lam la zhugs pa'i yongs su 'tshal ba'i mtshan nyid ni ji lta bu / spong ba'i mtshan nyid ni ji lta bu / mngon sum du bgyid pa'i mtshan nyid ni ji lta bu / bsgom pa'i mtshan nyid ni ji lta bur blta bar bgyi / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa / byams pa / byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa / mtha' gnyis spangs nas / 'di ltar dbu ma'i lam la zhugs pas gang gzugs yongs su shes pa'ang ma yin / yongs su @250a *// mi shes pa'ang ma yin pa de nyid de'i yongs su shes pa'o // gang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du yongs su shes pa'ang ma yin / yongs su mi shes pa'ang ma yin pa de nyid de'i yongs su shes pa'o // gang gzugs spong ba'ang ma yin / mi spong ba'ang ma yin pa de nyid de'i spong ba'o; ;gang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du spong ba'ang ma yin / mi spong ba'ang ma yin pa de nyid de'i spong ba'o; ;gang gzugs spong ba mngon sum du'ang mi byed la / mngon sum du mi byed pa'ang ma yin pa de nyid de'i mngon sum du byed pa'o // gang gzugs spong ba'i phyir lam bsgom pa'ang ma yin; bsgom pa'ang ma yin pa de nyid de'i sgom pa'o // de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag la'ang sbyar bar bya'o // de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to // bcom ldan 'das / byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'di lta bu'i yongs su 'tshal ba dang / spong ba dang / mngon sum du bgyid pa dang / bsgom pa dang ldan pa'i mya ngan las 'das @250b pa gang lags / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa / byams pa / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa ni zab bo; ;mchog tu zab bo // de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to //

column1: BagavAn Aha yatra punar sarva DarmAH nirmitAH tatra kaScid SrAvaka nirmitaH
column2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / byams pa / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa ni; 'di ltar mya ngan las 'das pa'ang ma yin / mya ngan las ma 'das pa'ang ma yin te / de'i phyir zab pa dang / mchog tu zab pa zhes bya'o // de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to // bcom ldan 'das / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'ang ma lags /

column1: kaScid pratyekabudDa nirmitaH kaScid boDisattva nirmitaH kaScid taTAgata nirmitaH kaScid kleSa nirmitaH kaScid karma nirmitaH nena suBUte paryAyeNa sarva DarmAH nirmitaka upamAH anAnAkaraNAH

column1: suBUtiH Aha yat punar idam Bagavan prahANam srotaApatti Palam vA sakRdAgAmi Palam vA anAgAmi Palam vA arhat tvam vA pratyekabudDa BUmiH vA nirmiapi nirmitam
column2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / byams pa / gzhan gyi don las brtsams te / 'khor ba yongs su mi gtong bas mya ngan las 'das pa'ang ma yin no // bdag gi don las brtsams te / mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su mi gtong bas / mya ngan las ma 'das pa'ang ma yin no // de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / @251a *// bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi don las brtsams te / 'khor ba yongs su mi gtong na / de 'khor ba yongs su ma btang bas 'dis ji ltar mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su btang bar mi 'gyur / bcom ldan 'das / gal te byang chub sems dpa' bdag gi don las brtsams te / mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su mi gtong na / 'dis ji ltar 'khor ba yongs su btang bar mi 'gyur lags /

column1: BagavAn Aha ye kecid suBUte DarmAH utpAditAH vA niroDitAH vA sarve ete nirmitAH
column2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / byams pa / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa / 'khor ba la'ang 'khor ba nyid du rnam par mi rtog / mya ngan las 'das pa la'ang mya ngan las 'das pa nyid du rnam par mi rtog ste / de de ltar rnam par mi rtog pas / 'di lta ste / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa de dag mnyam pas mnyam par 'gyur ro // de ci'i phyir zhe na / 'di ltar de 'khor ba la 'khor ba nyid du rnam par mi rtog pas / 'khor ba las yid byung bar mi 'gyur ro // de bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa la'ang mya ngan las 'das pa nyid du mi rtog pas / mya ngan las 'das pa las nyams par yang mi 'gyur te / de bzhin du 'khor ba na'ang mi nyams so // de ltar rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings la gnas pa de rigs pa 'dis 'khor ba'ang @251b yongs su mi gtong la / mya ngan las 'das pa'ang yongs su mi gtong bar rig par bya'o // de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to // bcom ldan 'das / 'o na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa / rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings la gnas pas / 'khor ba ji ltar ma btang ba de ltar blangs pa'ang ma mchis shing / mya ngan las 'das pa ji ltar ma btang ba de ltar blangs pa'ang ma mchis par mi 'gyur lags sam / bcom ldan 'das / gal te blangs pa ma mchis na ji ltar ma btang ba lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / byams pa / nga ni 'di ltar 'khor ba len to zhe'am / mi len to zhes mi smra'o // byams pa / 'on kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings la dmigs pa'i ye shes kyis sems la dbang thob pa thabs la mkhas pas 'khor ba bstan pa'i phyir / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'khor ba yongs su mi gtong bstan pa'i phyir / ba'o // zhes nga smra'o // stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i dbyings la gnas pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su mi gtong ba'o zhes nga smra'o / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad @252a *// ces gsol to // bcom ldan 'das / rnam par mi rtog pa'i mtshan nyid 'dus pa ji ltar blta bar bgyi /

column1: suBUtiH Aha
column2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / byams pa / gzugs gang yin pa dang / tshor ba gang yin pa dang / 'du shes gang yin pa dang / 'du byed rnams gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chos de dag dang stong pa nyid de'i dngos po dang dngos po med pa / gnyis su med pa /

column1: katamaH Bagavan DarmaH yaH na nirmitakaH
column2: spros pa med pa gang yin pa de ni; byams pa / rnam par mi rtog pa'i mtshan nyid 'dus par blta'o // de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to; ;bcom ldan 'das / ci nyan thos thams cad gcig tu nges par gtan du mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa lags sam / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / byams pa / de ni ma yin no // de ci'i phyir zhe na / byams pa / 'jig rten 'di ni khams sna tshogs pa / khams du ma ste / khams sna tshogs pa / khams du ma'i 'jig rten de na sems can gyi rigs dang; rang bzhin mang du dmigs te / byams pa / gang thog ma nyid nas bzang po'i bye brag don du gnyer te / bzang po'i bye brag nyid thob par 'gyur ba'i sems can gyi rigs kyi rnam @252b pa de lta bu'ang yod / gang thog ma nyid nas dman pa'i bye brag don du gnyer te / dman pa nyid thob la de nyid kyis chog par 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi rnam pa de lta bu'ang yod / gang thog ma nyid dman pa'i bye brag don du gnyer te / dman pa nyid thob la dman par shes nas de tsam gyis chog par mi 'dzin gyi / de'i gong du bzang po'i bye brag 'tshol zhing bzang po thob par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bye brag de lta bu yod do // de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to // bcom ldan 'das / sems can rnams kyi rigs kyi rnam pa gsum pa gang lags pa de dgra bcom pa nyid thob nas / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer kyang skye ba ma mchis pas ji ltar thob par 'gyur / bsgrub pa nyid de'i skye ba lags par ni /

column1: BagavAn Aha yasya na utpAdaH na niroDaH sa DarmaH na nimitaH suBUtiH Aha
column2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal lags so // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / byams pa / de'i skye ba las dang nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis 'gyur bar ni nga mi 'dogs kyi / de'i skye ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sprul pa dang yongs su bsngos pa'o zhes nga 'dogs so // de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to // bcom ldan 'das / 'di ltar thog ma nyid nas bzang po'i bye brag don du gnyer zhing bzang po'i bye brag nyid thob par 'gyur ba / byang chub sems dpa' @253a *// sems dpa' chen po'i bsam pa rlabs po che dang / che ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa ni ngo mtshar lags so // bcom ldan 'das /

column1: sa punar katamaH Bagavan
column2: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa rlabs po che ni gang lags / che ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa nyid ni gang lags /

column1: BagavAn Aha
column2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / byams pa / byang chub sems dpa' rnams brgya byin nyid dang / tshangs pa nyid dang; 'jig rten skyong ba nyid dang / 'khor los sgyur ba nyid thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa thams cad don du gnyer ba ma yin gyi / de dag la mi chags shing mi 'dzin pa gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa rlabs po che'o // byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'di lta ste / 'du byed yongs su mi gtong bas / de la ma chags pa'i bde ba dang 'dzin pa med pa'i bde ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba sems can thams cad dang thun mong du bya bar 'dod cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo bar byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni / de dag gi che ba nyid kyi lhag pa'i bsam par blta bar bya'o // de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to // bcom ldan 'das / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba lags so // byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba lags so // @253b bcom ldan 'das / rigs kyi bu'am / rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i chos ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba rnams la slob par 'tshal bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi lags so // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las / byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa rab tu dbye ba'i le'u zhes bya ste brgyad cu rtsa gsum pa'o //// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa / bam po lnga bcu rtsa brgyad pa / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor bzhi po de dag yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad pa'i phyir yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston cing / de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to // dga' dang gus dang dad pa'i mchog ni nyer bzhag ste // sgrib pa nyon mongs bsal nas dri ma las 'das pa // 'gro don mngon zhugs des pa'i shes rab pha rol phyin // gang la dpal rnams spyod pa de ni mnyan par gyis // dzambu'i gling 'dir chu klung ji snyed cig 'bab cing // me tog 'bras ldan sman dang nags tshal skyed byed pa // ma dros gnas pa'i klu dbang klu bdag brten gnas te // de ni klu yi bdag po de yi mthu dpal yin // rgyal ba'i nyan thos pa dag ji snyed chos ston dang // 'chad dang rigs pa dag dang ldan par brjod pa dang // mchog 'phags bde ba byed dang de yi 'bras thob pa // de dag kun kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu'i mthu // ci phyir zhen rgyal bas chos tshul gang bstan pa // @254a *// de la mi mchog slob mar gyur pas mngon bslabs shing // mngon sum byas nas bslabs pa ji bzhin ston byed de // sangs rgyas mthus byed rang gi stobs kyi mthus ma yin // gang la shes rab pha rol phyin mchog mi dmigs shing // byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs byang chub sems mi dmigs // de skad thos nas rmongs pa med cing skrag med pa // byang chub sems dpa' de ni bde gshegs shes rab spyod // gzugs med tshor ba med cing 'du shes sems pa med // de la rnam shes gnas ni rdul tsam yod ma yin // de chos kun la mi gnas gnas pa med par spyod // yongs su gzung med bde gshegs rnams kyis byang chub 'thob // ji ltar kun tu rgyu ba bzo sbyangs shes pa yis // dmigs med phung po rnam par 'jig pa 'byung ba ltar // byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig de ltar chos shes pa // mya ngan 'das la mi reg de ni shes rab gnas // yang 'di shes rab 'di ni gang yin su yi yin // gang las yin zhes chos 'di thams cad stong bar rtog / nye bar brtags nas zhum pa med cing skrag med pa // byang chub sems dpa' de ni byang chub nye ba yin // gal te mi shes bzhin du gzugs su 'du shes shing // tshor ba sems pa rnam shes phung por spyod byed cing // phung 'di stong zhes rtog na'ang byang chub sems dpa' ni // mtshan ma la spyod skye med gnas la dad ma yin // @254b gang zhig gzugs min tshor min 'du shes sems pa yin // rnam par shes la mi spyod gnas pa med par spyod // de ni spyod ces bya bar mi dmigs shes rab brtan // skye med blo ldan ting 'dzin zhi ba mchog la reg / byang chub sems gang de ltar 'dir bdag zhir gnas pa // de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan yin // bdag ni mnyam par bzhag ce'am langs zhes rlom sems med // ci phyir zhe na chos kyi rang bzhin yongs shes phyir / de ltar spyod na bde gshegs rnams kyi shes rab spyod // des ni spyod med spyod pa yin par rab shes phyir // chos gang spyod pa de'ang dmigs par mi 'gyur te // 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin // gang zhig yod pa ma yin de ni med ces bya // byis pa rnams kyis de brtags yod dang med par byed // yod dang med pa 'di gnyis med pa'i chos yin te // byang chub sems dpa' gang gis 'di shes nges par 'byung // gang 'dir phung po lnga dag sgyu ma 'drar shes shing // sgyu ma gzhan dang phung po gzhan du mi byed la // sna tshogs 'du shes bral zhing nye bar zhi spyod pa // 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin // dge ba'i bshes dang ldan zhing lhag mthong ldan gyur ba // rgyal ba rnams kyi yum thos skrag par yong mi 'gyur // gang zhig sdig pa'i grogs ldan gzhan gyi dring 'jog pa // de ni snod so ma btang chu reg zhig pa bzhin @255a *// ci phyir 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' bya zhe na // chags pa gcod byed kun la chags pa zad par 'dod // rgyal ba rnams kyi byang chub chags med gyur la reg / des na 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i ming thob bo // ci phyir 'di ni sems dpa' che zhes bya zhe na // sems can tshogs rnams mang po'i mchog tu gyur pa dang // sems can khams kyi lta rnams chen po gcod pa ste // de phyir sems dpa' chen po zhes ni rab brjod do // gtong ba che dang blo che ba dang mthu che dang // rgyal ba rnams kyi theg chen mchog la zhugs pa dang // go cha chen po bgos shing bdud kyi sgyu 'dul ba // de yi phyir na sems dpa' che zhes rab tu brjod // dper na sgyu ma mkhan gyis bzhi mdor sprul byas te // skye bo phal chen mgo mang bye ba gcod byed pa'i // gsang bya de dag ci 'dra de ltar byang chub sems // 'gro kun sprul 'drar rab shes de la 'jigs pa med // gzugs dang 'du shes tshor ba dang ni sems dpa' dang // rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol yod pa min // de ltar byang chub la 'jug zhum pa'i sems med pa // 'di ni gang zag dam pa rnams kyi go cha mchog / ci phyir 'di ni byang chub theg chen bya zhe na // de gang zhon nas sems can thams cad mya ngan zlo // theg pa 'di ni mkha' 'dra gzhal med khang chen te // dga' skyid bde ba mngon par 'thob byed theg pa'i mchog @255b gang zhig zhon nas phyogs su 'gro ba dmigs su med // mya ngan 'das par 'gro bar gsungs pa 'gro mi dmigs // dper na mi shi de yis 'gro rgyu med pa bzhin // rgyu des de ni mya ngan 'das zhes rab tu brjod // byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi mtha' dang // da ltar byung bar mi dmigs dus gsum dag pa ste // gang dag de ni 'dus ma byas yin spros med de // 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin // byang chub sems dpa' mkhas rig gang gi dus kyi tshe // skye med rnam par bsams te 'di ltar spyod byed cing // snying rje chen po bskyed kyang sems can 'du shes med; ;'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin // gal te sems can 'du shes sdug bsngal 'du shes bskyed // 'gro ba rnams kyi don bya sdug bsngal spang snyam ste // bdag dang sems can yongs rtog byang chub sems dpa' ste // 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin // bdag ci 'dra ba de 'drar sems can thams cad shes // sems can thams cad ci 'drar de 'drar chos kun shes // skye ba med dang skye ba gnyi gar mi rtog pa // 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin // 'jig rten dag na chos ming ji snyed yongs brjod pa // kun la skye ba dang ni yang dag 'das spangs nas // ye shes 'chi med dam pa de las gzhan med 'thob // de phyir 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin ces bya // byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig dogs med de @256a *// ltar spyod // shes rab ldan te mnyam nyid gnas par shes par bya // chos rnams rang bzhin med par yongs su shes gyur pa // 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin // gang zhig gzugs la mi gnas tshor bar mi gnas shing // gang zhig 'du shes mi gnas sems par mi gnas la // rnam shes gang mi gnas pa chos nyid gnas pa ste // 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin // rtag dang mi rtag bde dang sdug bsngal sdug mi sdug / bdag dang bdag med de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin stong // 'bras bu thob dang dgra bcom sa la mi gnas shing // rang rgyal sa dang de bzhin sangs rgyas sar mi gnas // ji ltar 'dren pa 'dus ma byas khams mi gnas shing // de bzhin 'dus byas la'ang mi gnas gnas med spyod // de ltar byang chub sems dpa' gnas la gnas med gnas // gnas med gnas yin 'di ni rgyal bas gnas par gsungs // gang bdag bde gshegs nyan thos 'gyur bar bya snyam dang // rang sangs rgyas dang de bzhin chos rgyal 'gyur 'dod pa // bzod pa 'di la ma brten 'thob par mi nus te // dper na tshu rol pha rol 'gro ngogs mi mthong bzhin // chos 'chad pa dang nyan dang bshad bya gang yin dang // 'bras bu thob dang rkyen rgyal de bzhin 'jig rten mgon // mkhas pa gsal bas thob pa'i @256b mya ngan 'das gang yin // de kun sgyu ma lta bur de bzhin gshegs pas bstan // gang zag bzhi po 'di dag de la mi skrag ste // rgyal sras bden la mkhas dang phyir mi ldog pa dang // dgra bcom dri ma bsal zhing som nyi spangs pa dang // bzhi pa dge ba'i bshes kyis yongs su zin pa'o // byang chub sems dpa' mkhas rig de ltar spyod pa ni // dgra bcom sa la mi slob rkyen rtog sa la min // thams cad mkhyen nyid ched du sangs rgyas chos rjes slob // gang zhig slob mi slob la mi slob de slob yin // gzugs 'phel yongs su nyams dang yongs su gzung phyir min // chos rnams sna tshogs yongs su gzung phyir mi slob par // slob cing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yongs 'dzin la // nges 'byung gang yin 'di ni yon tan dga' ba'i slob // gzugs ni shes rab ma yin gzugs la shes rab med // rnam shes 'du shes tshor dang sems pa 'di dag ni // shes rab ma yin 'di dag la'ang shes rab med // 'di ni nam mkha'i khams dang mtshungs te tha dad med // dmigs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin de ni pha mtha' med // sems can rang bzhin gang yin de'ang pha mtha' med // nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin de yang pha mtha' med // 'jig rten mkhyen pa'i shes rab de yang pha mtha' med // 'du shes tshu rol yin zhes 'dren pas yongs su bsgrags // 'du shes rnam par @257a *// bshig nas spong ba pha rol 'gro / gang dag 'du shes bral ba 'di ni rjes thob pa // de dag pha rol phyin nas ston pa'i bka' la gnas // gal te ston pas kyang ni gangg'a'i bye snyed kyi // bskal par bzhugs te sems can zhes sgra yongs bsgrags kyang // gzod nas dag pas sems can skye bar ga la 'gyur // 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin // gang tshe nga ni pha rol phyin pa mchog 'di dang // mthun par smra gyur de tshe sngon gyi skyes mchog gis // ma 'ongs pa yi dus na sangs rgyas 'gyur ro zhes // nga lung bstan par gyur ces rgyal ba de skad gsung // shes rab pha rol phyin pa gang la mgon spyod pa // 'di ni gang zhig gus byas 'dzin dang chub byed pa // de la dug dang mtshon dang me dang chus mi tshugs // bdud dang bdud kyi phyogs kyis glags kyang rnyed mi 'gyur // la las bde gshegs yongs su mya ngan 'das pa yi // mchod rten rin chen bdun las byas shing mchod byed la // bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag gangg'a yi // bye ma snyed kyis bye ba phrag stong zhing bkang ste // yongs su rtag bzung zhing rnams bye ba mtha' yas na; ;sems can ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyis // las gzhan mi byed lha yi me tog spos rab dang // byug pas dus gsum bskal pa'am de bas lhag mchod la // gang @257b zhig gang las rnam 'dren stobs bcu 'byung 'gyur ba // bde bar gshegs kyi yum 'di glegs bam la bris te // 'chang zhing me tog byug pas bsti stang byed gyur na // mchod rten byas mchod bsod nams de ni char mi phod // rgyal ba'i shes rab pha rol phyin 'di rig sngags che // sems can khams med mya ngan sdug bsngal chos zhi byed // gang dag 'das dang gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten mgon // rig sngags 'di bslabs sman pa'i rgyal po bla med 'gyur // gang dag phan dang snying rjer bcas pa spyad spyod pa // rig sngags 'di la bslabs nas mkhas pa byang chub reg / 'dus byas bde dang 'dus ma byas bde gang yin pa // bde ba de kun 'di las 'byung bar rig par bya // sa bon btab nas sa la gnas te 'byung 'gyur ba // tshogs la rkyen nas rnam mang gzugs dag rnam par skye // pha rol phyin lnga byang chub yon tan ji snyed pa // de dag kun kyang shes rab pha rol phyin las skye // 'khor los sgyur rgyal lam gang nas ni rtag 'gro ba; ;lam de nyid nas rin chen bdun dang dpung tshogs kun // gang nas rgyal ba'i shes rab pha rol phyin 'di 'gro // de nyid nas ni yon tan chos kun 'gro bar 'gyur // rgyal bas brgya byin dri ba yongs dris lan gsol pa // gal te gangg'a'i bye snyed sangs rgyas zhing gyur la // de kun rgyal ba'i ring bsrel byur bur gtams gyur kyang // bdag ni shes rab pha rol phyi @258a *// pa 'di nyid len // ci slad ce na sku gdung mi gus bdag ma lags // 'on kyang shes rab yongs su bsgoms pas mchod par bgyid // dper na rgyal po rten mi rim gro thob pa ltar // sangs rgyas ring bsrel shes rab pha rol phyin la brten // nor bu rin chen yon tan kun ldan rin thang med // gab tse gang du stsal pa de ni phyag bgyi 'os // de phyung gyur kyang gab tse la ni dga' bgyid de // yon tan de dag nor bu rin chen de yi lags // de bzhin shes rab pha rol phyin mchog yon tan gyis // rgyal ba mya ngan 'das kyang ring bsrel mchod pa brnyes // de ltas gang zhig rgyal ba'i yon tan 'dzin 'tshal des // shes rab pha rol phyin blang 'di ni thar pa lags // sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba shes rab ste // tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus bsam gtan de bzhin no // dge chos chud mi gzan phyir yongs su 'dzin pa yin // 'di ni chos rnams thams cad tshul gcig ston par byed // dper na dzambu'i gling na shing rnams bye ba stong // rnam pa sna tshogs rnam pa du ma gzugs mang ba // grib mar gyur pa'i grangs su brjod pa ma gtogs par; ;grib ma sna tshogs med cing bye brag yod ma yin // de bzhin rgyal ba'i pha rol phyin lnga 'di dag kyang // shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i ming nyid thob par 'gyur // thams cad @258b mkhyen pa nyid phyir yongs su bsngos byas na // byang chub ces byar drug po 'di kun ro gcig 'gyur // byang chub sems dpa' gal te rab tu mi shes bzhin // gzugs dang 'du shes tshor dang sems pa rnam par shes // mi rtag yongs su ston pa bcos la spyod pa ste // mkhas pa nam yang chos rnams 'jig par mi byed do // gang la gzugs min tshor min 'du shes mi dmigs shing / rnam par shes pa ma yin sems pa mi dmigs la // chos kun skye med stong pa'i tshul du rab shes pa // 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin // la las gangg'a'i klung gi bye snyed zhing rnams na // sems can ji snyed 'khod kun dgra bcom nyid btul bas // gang gis shes rab pha rol phyin 'di yig bris te // sems can mchog la glegs byin bsod nams khyad par 'phags // ci phyir zhe na smra mchog de dag 'dir bslabs nas // chos rnams mtha' dag stong pa nyid du 'dir ston byed // de thos nyan thos myur du rnam par grol la reg / rang rgyal byang chub dang ni sangs rgyas byang chub reg / myu gu med par 'jig rten sdong 'byung yod med na // de la yal 'dab me tog 'bras bu ga la 'byung // byang chub sems med rgyal 'byung 'jig rten yod med na // 'bras bu brgya byin tshangs pa nyan thos ga la 'byung // nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gang tshe 'od kyi dra ba 'gyed // de tshe sems can las byed brtson pa de @259a *// bzhin du // mkhas pa shes phyir 'jig rten byang chub sems byung na // ye shes kyis ni sems can yon tan chos dang ldan // dper na ma dros mtsho la klu bdag med gyur na // dzambu'i gling 'dir chu klung 'bab par ga la 'gyur // chu klung med na me tog 'bras bu 'byung mi 'gyur // rgya mtsho la yang rin chen gzugs mang med par 'gyur // de bzhin 'dir yang byang chub sems med bde gshegs kyi // ye shes 'jig rten 'di dag kun tu ga la 'byung // ye shes med na yon tan 'phel med byang chub ldan // rgya mtsho 'dra ba'i sangs rgyas chos kyang med par 'gyur // 'jig rten 'di na snang byed srog chags ji snyed pa // kun gyis snang bar bya phyir 'od rnams byung ba bas // nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer gcig phyung chos mchog ste // snang byed tshogs kyi 'od rnams kun gyis char me phod // nyan thos tshogs rnams ji snyed sbyin dang tshul khrims dang // bsgom dang rab tu ldan pa'i bsod nams tshogs skyed pa'ang // byang chub sems dpa' rjes su yi rang sems gcig la // nyan thos tshogs kyi bsod nams phung pos char mi phod // 'das dus sngon gyi sangs rgyas bya ba khrag khrig gang // zhing mang mtha' yas bye stong dag na gang bzhugs dang // gang yang mya ngan 'das pa 'jig rten mgon po rnams // sdug bsngal zad par bya phyir rin chen chos ston @259b pa; ;dang po byang chub mchog tu thugs bskyed bskyed pa nas // rnam par 'dren pa rnams kyi dam chos zad kyi dus // de bar rgyal ba de dag bsod nams gang yin pa // pha rol phyin dang ldan dang sangs rgyas chos gang dang // gang yang sangs rgyas sras rnams dang ni nyan thos dang // slob dang mi slob dge ba zag bcas zag med pa // bsdus nas byang chub sems dpa' rjes su yi rang zhing // 'gro ba'i don rgyu byang chub phyir ni thams cad bsngo // yongs bsngo gal te sems su 'du shes 'byung 'gyur zhing // byang chub 'du shes yongs bsngo sems can 'du shes na // 'du shes phyir na lta gnas sems ni gsum la chags // dmigs pa yod pas yongs su bsngo bar chud ma yin // gal te 'di ltar chos 'di 'gags shing zad pa dang // gang du yongs su bsngo ba de yang zad pa dang // chos kyis chos la nam yang mi bsngo shes gyur na // de ltar rab tu shes pas yongs su bsngos pa yin // gal te mtshan mar byed na de ni bsngo ma yin // ji ste mtshan ma med na byang chub bsngo ba yin // ji ltar dug dang 'dres pa'i kha zas bzang za ba // dkar po'i chos la dmigs pa'ang de 'drar rgyal bas gsungs // de ltas 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ba bslab bya ste // ji ltar rgyal ba de dag dge ba de mkhyen pa'i // rnam pa gang yin 'byung gang mtshan nyid gang yin la // rjes su yi rang de lta de ltar yongs su bsngo // de ltar bsod nams @260a *// byang chub yongs su bsngo byed na // dug med sangs rgyas mi spong rgyal bas gsungs pa smra // de ltar yongs bsngo dpa' bos 'jig rten dmigs can gyi // byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed thams cad zil gyis gnon // dmus long dmigs bu med pa bye ba khrag khrig rnams // lam yang mi shes grong khyer 'jug par ga la 'gyur // shes rab med na mig med pha rol phyin lnga 'di // dmigs bu med pas byang chub reg par nus ma yin // gang tshe shes rab kyis ni rab tu zin gyur na // de tshe mig rnyed gyur cing 'di yi ming thob bo // dper na ri mo'i las ni yongs zin mig med pa // ji srid mig ma bris pas rngan pa mi thob bzhin // gang tshe 'dus byas 'dus ma byas dang dkar nag chos // shes rab rnam par bshig nas rdul tsam mi dmigs tshe // 'jig rten dag na shes rab pha rol phyin grangs 'gro / nam mkha' gang la'ang cung zad mi gnas de ngang 'dra // gal te bdag ni rgyal ba'i
